name: Extreme Farming Simulator Accent +T
description:
Extreme Farming Simulator Accent +T is a hyper-realistic farming simulator designed to capture the feeling of an average United States Farmer. In order to achieve this the game uses a real-time clock that only allows you to purchase and sell crops when farmers would do so in real life. Also, a game over resulting from a lack of funds is irreversible just like in real life. 

Have Fun!
